item.title: Detachable Penis
item.description: [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/jar_of_flies/nutshell.md#my-gift-of-self-is-raped-vyl-wnanory|I woke up this morning]] [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/jar_of_flies/nutshell.md#my-gift-of-self-is-raped-vyl-wnanory|With a bad hangover]] [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/jar_of_flies/nutshell.md#my-gift-of-self-is-raped-vyl-wnanory|And my penis was missing again]] [[songs/a/alice_in_chains/jar_of_flies/nutshell.md#my-gift-of-self-is-raped-vyl-wnanory|This happens all the time, it’s detachable]] Â [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/the_last_sunset/insane.
